content:
As a language model AI, I don't have access to current events or current release dates, but some upcoming films that you might be interested in are:

- In The Heights - Directed by Jon M. Chu, this musical film is based on the Tony-winning stage play by Hamilton creator, Lin-Manuel Miranda, exploring the lives and stories of residents of Washington Heights, New York.

- Candyman - This horror movie is from the producing team behind Get Out, and boasts director Nia DaCosta, lead actress Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, and writer/producer Jordan Peele.  

- Eternals - Marvel's upcoming superhero film features a ensemble cast with a predominantly diverse cast of actors, including Angelina Jolie, Kumail Nanjiani, and Richard Madden.

- Dune - Directed by Denis Villeneuve, who helmed the critically acclaimed films like Arrival and Blade Runner 2049, this film is based on the classic sci-fi novel of the same name by Frank Herbert, boasting an A-list cast including Timothee Chalamet, Oscar Isaac, and Zendaya.

- The French Dispatch - Wes Anderson's latest movie features an ensemble cast and follows a group of American journalists in France at a fictional weekly magazine. 

These are just a few of the many exciting films on the horizon. There's no telling what new innovations in storytelling and creative artistry await us in the future!
